    • Constructor Detail

      • CostEstimationStrategy

        public CostEstimationStrategy(Order order,
                              PackingStation packing,
                              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.awt.Point> storagePoints)
        CostEstimationStrategy Constructor. Gets the values from the superClass Robot. Assigns the the fields: Order, PackingStation. Populates the StoragePoints HashMap. Initialises the value of noSteps.
        Parameters:
        order - an Order object. Holds the instance of the Order class that contains the orders from the "SIM" file.
        packing - an an PackingStatioln object. Holds the instance of the Packing Station that the Robot need to deliver the items to.
        storagePoints - a HashMap of String, Point. Contains the coordinates of the Storage Shelves.

    • Method Detail

      • distanceEstimator

        public boolean distanceEstimator(double x,
                                 double y,
                                 java.lang.String id,
                                 int batteryLvl,
                                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> robotsCharge,
                                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.awt.Point> charges)
        Calculates whether or not a Robot can carry out an order.
        Parameters:
        x - a double value. Holds the current x coordinate of the Robot.
        y - a double value. Holds the current y coordinate of the Robot.
        id - a String. Holds the Robots UID.
        batteryLvl - an int value. Holds the current battery level of the Robot.
        robotsCharge - a HashMap of String, String. Contains the Robots UID, and their respective Charging Pod.
        charges - a HashMap of String, Point. Contains the coordinates of each Charging Pod.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean value. True if the Robot can carry out the order, else false.
